original: We all know that beer makes you sharp and insightful.
translated: 众所周知，啤酒能赐予你敏锐的洞察力。

original: Email us your drunken pearls of wisdom!
translated: 通过邮件告诉我们你酒后的灵光一现吧！

original: "A stray dog really will eat anything that you vomit."
translated: 「流浪狗真的会把人吐出来的东西吃得一干二净。」
「不要先入为主，觉得TA一定是『她』。」

original: "Insecure 40-year-old women can be vindictive bitches when you turn them down at 2 AM."
translated: 「四十岁怨妇真的很可怕，别在凌晨两点跟她提分手。」

original: "A grown man can have hours of fun with a supermarket cart."
translated: 「大人也可以乘着购物车玩上好几个小时。」

original: "Police officers don't take kindly to being tipped when they drop you off."
translated: 「警察叫你下车的时候，可不要给他们小费。」

original: "Never tell a doorman that 'he looks pretty when he's angry.'"
translated: 「别跟夜店看门人说『生气的你最美』。」
